html:
5.4.18  9:22 am   WHY DO WE ALL USE ONLY ONE FONT?

     that's capital-ist.
5.4.18  8:14 am   DId you like maybe i could eat blades of grass? I know you made it very fast.
5.4.18  7:35 am   how do you forget your sadness and depression in life?
5.4.18  7:28 am   Why are computers so hard to use
5.4.18  7:27 am   What do I do when I'm bored in school?
5.4.18  6:51 am   Do you think anonymity is healthy?
5.4.18  6:40 am   Are you the FBI agent that spies on me?
5.4.18  6:11 am   do you sidechain compressors?
5.4.18  5:58 am   what do you think about consuming pants
5.4.18  3:09 am   What was the question you skipped on the "maybe i could eat blades of grass" video?
5.4.18  2:04 am   If you're going to make a religion, what would it be?
5.4.18  1:13 am   Are you a wizard?

5.4.18  1:12 am   My sister is a bit disappointed you swear because she likes your songs but she doesn't like swearing. Could you be so kind as to tell her why swearing is absolutely fine? Especially in song form, they are just words and in my opinion do not affect the song itself, according to her swearing makes the song worse.
5.4.18  1:07 am   Do you think the internet is a Nifty thing?

5.4.18  12:31 am   I have been listening to the lyrics to a lot of your songs and you seem to have something bad going on.

      Like how you can't go home. I know your like to joke a lot so I'm wondering if it's all a joke or if you need help.

5.3.18  10:51 pm   Were any of the answers given to Damien Maymdien in "maybe i could eat blades of grass" true for you particularly,

     or were they just for the sake of the video, as with the many song lyrics that people ask about?
5.3.18  10:44 pm   Is youtube your full time job
5.3.18  9:42 pm   What is your opinion on adventuring?
5.3.18  8:53 pm   please explain what you mean about the world constantly starting and ending?
5.3.18  7:53 pm   In reference to 3.22.17  3:44 pm : what about another sequel to bookstacking?
5.3.18  7:49 pm   Do you think my dogs are cute?
5.3.18  7:41 pm   5.3.18  8:52 am Why don't you do that thing you did back in 2014, where you had a little spinning disc with the song playing?

5.3.18  7:18 pm   Hi Bill, your music has made me enamoured with tonal music again and I used a key signature for the first time in a long time, but then I realized I'm having trouble writing effective tonal melodies, do you have any tips?
5.3.18  7:13 pm   hi. are capital letters banned?
5.3.18  6:46 pm   Have you considered animating some of your older music videos (i.e. "new song: i can play")?
5.3.18  6:33 pm   What're your thoughts on grammatically correct sentences?
5.3.18  5:25 pm   Are practice and experience equally important when it comes to being good at music?
5.3.18  5:14 pm   Will you ever do a vlog?
5.3.18  5:04 pm   5.2.18  9:10 pm Not the asker but that same logic applies to job interviews, right?
5.3.18  5:01 pm   what do you know
5.3.18  4:49 pm   What's a 10 piece band called (as in duo, trio, quartet, quintet, etc)?
5.3.18  4:46 pm   4.30.18  4:18 pm    of course you do, via your local public library, imslp.org, thousands of recordings available on all digital media sources. why do you avoid this question?
5.3.18  4:45 pm   thoughts on the fact that the korean war is no longer on pause forever and it's actually over?
5.3.18  4:09 pm   communism or capitalism? which one is satan?
5.3.18  4:00 pm   I really like your personality you express on the internet. Your answers are so weird and unique and it seems like you came from a higher dimension. So why are you here on earth?
5.3.18  3:44 pm   Do you like working out of your home, like on a train, bus, of in a coffee shop?
5.3.18  3:30 pm   How long did it take to write, produce and edit "and the day goes on"?
5.3.18  3:29 pm   how to become music literate (like note and chord names, etc)? is it kind of like learning a language?

5.3.18  3:29 pm   I really liked your new song, the production is super interesting and unique. Are all the small details planned\in there because you want to keep your style as it is or is it just... Your normal creative process?
5.3.18  2:48 pm   how 2 get money
5.3.18  2:30 pm   Help, I'm trapped in the basement of an eighteenth-century building and I'm going stir crazy
5.3.18  2:26 pm   are you the real slim shady?
5.3.18  2:11 pm   5.1.18  7:07 pm I meant the ones you haven't
5.3.18  2:05 pm   How sad are you?
5.3.18  1:54 pm   Can you tell me some tips on how to make good poems?

5.3.18  1:31 pm   5.1.18  1:35 pm . That's exactly it, I don't where it's coming from. Some quick research on the internet shows that sound bouncing off of objects other than the microphone is picked up by the microphone, causing small interference. I could email you an example of some staticky audio I've recorded if you'd like.

     Anyway, in high quality audio, such as yours,

     when there's silence it's actually silent,

     there's not a little buzz in the background that comes from "sound bouncing off of other objects".

     Apparently solutions are to either get a real high quality microphone,

     or to deck out the room with objects that sound doesn't bounce of, neither of which are in my budget. But you don't seem to have either of those either. So what do you do?
5.3.18  1:26 pm   how much control do you put into creating things and into over which parts of the process?
5.3.18  1:25 pm   Do you like my spanish teacher
5.3.18  1:24 pm   kill your self you mother butt
5.3.18  12:56 pm   How come when people reference one of your song lyrics by saying something like 'you said...' you always correct them and say that you didn't say the thing, but sung it in a song?
